page.title: 08BREAK_TIME
page.content: Clatter! Bang! Escape! 11 o'clock! What will it be today? We usually play {'TIG'}or{'COPS AND ROBBERS'.}In the game of tig, we have one tigger or catcher and when they touch someone they are taken off to the tigger's den! They can be released by someone who has not yet been caught. When we play 'COPS AND ROBBERS' either we bring our own toy guns or use bats and skittles. On wet and windy days we ask if we can play inside in the G.P.room. This room is 11m long by 5m wide so there is plenty room for laying out floor games. We sometimes lay out the road track,using blocks to make housing estates. We normally play in two or three groups and play with games like {SNAKES & LADDERS, LUDO and GET FIT. There are often rows caused by some one cheating, spoiling the game!
